languages.text: "По окончании пряток вас ждет пиршество. Если угадаете хотя бы одного лицемера — еще и приятный трофей. За всех четырех — особая награда. Помню, на одной из игр слуга так вжился в роль барона, что все господа единогласно даровали ему милость, оставив ему титул и привилегии знати. Подобное случается редко, но... кто знает, что ждет нас сегодня, ведь этим вечером достойнейшего определяете вы и только вы, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "По окончании пряток вас ждет пиршество. Если угадаете хотя бы одного лицемера — еще и приятный трофей. За всех четырех — особая награда. Помню, на одной из игр слуга так вжился в роль барона, что все господа единогласно даровали ему милость, оставив ему титул и привилегии знати. Подобное случается редко, но... кто знает, что ждет нас сегодня, ведь этим вечером достойнейшего определяете вы и только вы, звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

languages.text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: "По окончании пряток вас ждет пиршество. Если угадаете хотя бы одного лицемера — еще и приятный трофей. За всех четырех — особая награда. Помню, на одной из игр слуга так вжился в роль барона, что все господа единогласно даровали ему милость, оставив ему титул и привилегии знати. Подобное случается редко, но... кто знает, что ждет нас сегодня, ведь этим вечером достойнейшего определяете вы и только вы, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "There will be a feast at the end of the hunt. If you guess at least one impostor, you will also win a nice trophy. If you guess all four, there will be a special reward. I remember at one of the festivals, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... Who knows what the evening brings, for tonight it is you who will determine the worthy, o Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

Such a thing rarely happens, but... Who knows what the evening brings, for tonight it is you who will determine the worthy, o Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

languages.text: “而在这场狩猎结束时，我们会举办一场盛宴。如果您正确地找出了至少一名冒牌货，您将赢得一件丰厚的奖品，而如果您找到了全部四名冒牌货，我们会为您准备一份更加特别的礼物。我还记得，之前某次狩猎的时候，某个仆人扮演的男爵惟妙惟肖，所有贵族都一致同意，允许他保留贵族的头衔与特权。像这样的事情很少会发生，不过……谁知道今晚会发生什么事情呢？因为今晚，所有人的生杀大权都掌握在您的手中，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: “而在这场狩猎结束时，我们会举办一场盛宴。如果您正确地找出了至少一名冒牌货，您将赢得一件丰厚的奖品，而如果您找到了全部四名冒牌货，我们会为您准备一份更加特别的礼物。我还记得，之前某次狩猎的时候，某个仆人扮演的男爵惟妙惟肖，所有贵族都一致同意，允许他保留贵族的头衔与特权。像这样的事情很少会发生，不过……谁知道今晚会发生什么事情呢？因为今晚，所有人的生杀大权都掌握在您的手中，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: «Al final de la caza, se celebra un gran banquete. Si ha descubierto por lo menos a uno de los impostores, usted también ganará un premio. Si pilla a los cuatro, el premio será aún más espléndido. Recuerdo que, en una de las cazas, un siervo se hizo pasar por barón con tal habilidad que todos los señores acordaron de manera unánime concederle su favor y le permitieron conservar el título nobiliario y los privilegios que conlleva. Ocurre muy pocas veces, pero... quién sabe lo que nos depara la velada, pues esta noche será usted quien escoja a los dignos, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: «Al final de la caza, se celebra un gran banquete. Si ha descubierto por lo menos a uno de los impostores, usted también ganará un premio. Si pilla a los cuatro, el premio será aún más espléndido. Recuerdo que, en una de las cazas, un siervo se hizo pasar por barón con tal habilidad que todos los señores acordaron de manera unánime concederle su favor y le permitieron conservar el título nobiliario y los privilegios que conlleva. Ocurre muy pocas veces, pero... quién sabe lo que nos depara la velada, pues esta noche será usted quien escoja a los dignos, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».

languages.text: "Avın sonunda büyük bir ziyafet düzenleriz. Taklitçilerden en az birini tahmin ettiğinizde güzel bir ödül de kazanırsınız. Dördünü de tahmin ederseniz daha da özel bir ödülün sahibi olursunuz. Hiç unutmam, avlardan birinde hizmetkârın biri baron rolünü o kadar iyi oynamıştı ki tüm lordlar oy birliğiyle ona lütufta bulunup soyluluk ünvanının ve ayrıcalıklarını korumasına müsaade etmişti. Böyle bir şeyin yaşanması pek nadirdir ama bakalım bu akşam neler olacak... Zira bu gece layık olanı siz belirleyeceksiniz Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: "Avın sonunda büyük bir ziyafet düzenleriz. Taklitçilerden en az birini tahmin ettiğinizde güzel bir ödül de kazanırsınız. Dördünü de tahmin ederseniz daha da özel bir ödülün sahibi olursunuz. Hiç unutmam, avlardan birinde hizmetkârın biri baron rolünü o kadar iyi oynamıştı ki tüm lordlar oy birliğiyle ona lütufta bulunup soyluluk ünvanının ve ayrıcalıklarını korumasına müsaade etmişti. Böyle bir şeyin yaşanması pek nadirdir ama bakalım bu akşam neler olacak... Zira bu gece layık olanı siz belirleyeceksiniz Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."

languages.text: 「『偽者探し』の最後に、素晴らしいご馳走を用意しています。一人でも偽者を当てることができたら、素晴らしい賞品を獲得します。4人すべてを当てることができたら、さらに特別な賞品を用意しています。かつての『偽者探し』で、使用人が男爵の役をうまく務めたので、何の異論もなく彼に貴族の階級と特権を与えました。そのようなことはめったに起こりませんが、夜が何をもたらすかは誰にも分かりません。今晩は、誰が優れているか判断するのはあなた様です、天の{mf|君|姫}」
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: 「『偽者探し』の最後に、素晴らしいご馳走を用意しています。一人でも偽者を当てることができたら、素晴らしい賞品を獲得します。4人すべてを当てることができたら、さらに特別な賞品を用意しています。かつての『偽者探し』で、使用人が男爵の役をうまく務めたので、何の異論もなく彼に貴族の階級と特権を与えました。そのようなことはめったに起こりませんが、夜が何をもたらすかは誰にも分かりません。今晩は、誰が優れているか判断するのはあなた様です、天の{mf|君|姫}」

languages.text: « Une fois la chasse terminée, nous organisons un grand festin. Ceux qui ont démasqué au moins l'un des imposteurs se voient décerner un prix, mais quiconque démasque les quatre reçoit une récompense encore plus spéciale. Je me souviens qu'une fois, un serviteur avait tellement bien joué son rôle de baron que les seigneurs ont décidé à l'unanimité de lui laisser garder le titre et les privilèges de la noblesse. Cela n'arrive que rarement, mais... qui sait ce que nous réserve l'avenir. Et ce soir, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, c'est vous qui déterminerez qui sera digne ! »
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois la chasse terminée, nous organisons un grand festin. Ceux qui ont démasqué au moins l'un des imposteurs se voient décerner un prix, mais quiconque démasque les quatre reçoit une récompense encore plus spéciale. Je me souviens qu'une fois, un serviteur avait tellement bien joué son rôle de baron que les seigneurs ont décidé à l'unanimité de lui laisser garder le titre et les privilèges de la noblesse. Cela n'arrive que rarement, mais... qui sait ce que nous réserve l'avenir. Et ce soir, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, c'est vous qui déterminerez qui sera digne ! »

languages.text: "Am Ende der Jagd halten wir ein großes Gelage ab. Wenn Ihr mindestens einen der Hochstapler erratet, gewinnt Ihr auch einen prächtigen Preis. Erratet Ihr alle vier, gibt es eine noch viel größere Belohnung. Bei einer Jagd hat ein Diener die Rolle eines Barons so gut gespielt, dass alle Lords einstimmig entschieden haben, ihn den Titel und die Privilegien des Adels behalten zu lassen. Das geschieht nur selten, aber ... wer weiß, was der Abend noch bringt, denn heute entscheidet Ihr, wer würdig ist, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}."
languages.original_text: "At the end of the hunt, we hold a great feast. If you guess at least one of the impostors, you will also win a fine prize. If you guess all four, there will be an even more special reward. I remember, at one of the hunts, a servant played the role of a baron so well that all the lords unanimously granted him favour and let him keep the title and privileges of the nobility. Such a thing rarely happens, but... who knows what the evening will bring, for tonight, it is you who will determine the worthy, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
